definitions.definition: The conveyance or transfer of an estate, either in fee for life or for years, most commonly the latter.
Transmission by formal act or conveyance to an heir or successor; transference; especially, the transfer or transmission of the crown or royal authority to a successor.
The end of something, in a negative sense; downfall .
examples: The lack of funding ultimately led to the project's demise .

definitions.definition: The atmospheric disintegration of a satellite or satellite component upon re-entering Earth's atmosphere.
examples: Relocating components to places where they receive more heating effect earlier in the reentry and even triggering a partial break-up of the satellite structure during reentry to aid demise .

main_definition: ( law ) The conveyance or transfer of an estate, either in fee for life or for years, most commonly the latter.
secondary_definitions: Transmission by formal act or conveyance to an heir or successor; transference; especially, the transfer or transmission of the crown or royal authority to a successor.
( countable ) The end of something, in a negative sense; downfall .
( technology ) The atmospheric disintegration of a satellite or satellite component upon re-entering Earth's atmosphere.
